Steps.Message: Update at 17:51 - We've remotely diverted electricity around the faulty part of the network, restoring power to 137 properties. This leaves 166 properties without power. We'll keep sending text updates to everyone until all the power to your area is on. If you want to stop receiving texts, please just send CANCEL to 80876 (standard text fees apply).

We became aware of a power cut at 14:31. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 17:51 - We've remotely diverted electricity around the faulty part of the network, restoring power to 137 properties. This leaves 166 properties without power. We'll keep sending text updates to everyone until all the power to your area is on. If you want to stop receiving texts, please just send CANCEL to 80876 (standard text fees apply).

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
